name: [DEMO] Escape Detention
description:
This game is a web browser demo version of our full game "Escape Detention."

The demo includes a section of the game limited with a timer for five minutes. In those five minutes the player can do anything they can do in the real section of the full game, as to ensure the experience is authentic. 

If you enjoy your time with the demo, and want to continue, consider buying the full game!

Escape Detention Full Game
